scripts.staging-s3-deploy: aws s3 sync ./build s3://staging.pasleyhill.com --acl=public-read --cache-control 'max-age=0' --profile pasley_hill_admin && echo "Release complete!!"
scripts.staging-deploy: snowpack build && sls deploy --stage staging && aws s3 sync ./build s3://staging.pasleyhill.com --acl=public-read --cache-control 'max-age=0' --profile pasley_hill_admin && echo "Release complete!!"
scripts.deploy: snowpack build && sls deploy --stage prod && aws s3 sync ./build s3://pasleyhill.com --acl=public-read --cache-control 'max-age=0' --profile pasley_hill_admin && echo "Release complete!!"
